name: IOU
description:
After a night of gambling and drinking you find out you lost an I.O.U for a days worth of chores to your friend.

Made for 30 Day RPG Maker game jam, March 2021

The theme was "Redemption". This word has two definitions. One relating to moral recovery, and one related to redeeming a promised service or good such as an IOU.

One of the rules was we had to "only use default RTP".
